contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1885 D St. Joseph's Contest
St. Joseph's Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
st-joseph-s-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Leigh Cricket Ground (adj. Field), Beech Walk, Leigh Each band played a polka and a quadrille. Mr. James Barker was an organist and formerly of the Rochdale Borough Band. The first prize was an electro-plated cornet (value twelve guineas) and £2 in money. Second prize £6, third prize £4, fourth prize £2 and fifth prize £1. 8 bands competed
Oct. 22, 2012, 6:52 p.m. Oct. 7, 2019, 11:11 a.m.
1 Farnworth Old Edwin Swift Roach
2 St. James's Tyldesley Richard Marsden No. 1
3 Bedford (Leigh) Band James Frost Frost and Sun
4 Bridge Croft William Taylor Marien
5 Halliwell John Gilberthorpe The Don
